evidence.claim: Cambio utilizes AWS services for hosting and data storage, ensuring scalability and reliability.
The company indicates compliance with HIPAA regulations for secure health data transactions.
Cambio supports FHIR standards for health data integration, facilitating interoperability among health systems.
They make use of Twilio API for communication services within their platform, enhancing user engagement.
Multiple references to X12 transaction sets showcasing their capabilities in EDI for healthcare administration.

icp.icp_reason: Engaged in HIPAA compliant data management and supports X12 transactions.
